# Cyber-Arch: Cyberpunk Arch Linux Rice

> **"Into the dark... with precision."**
> A visually striking, cyberpunk-themed Arch Linux configuration built on Hyprland

---

## ğŸ–¼ï¸ Preview

| Desktop | Rofi Menu | Terminal & Fastfetch |
| ------- | --------- | -------------------- |
|         |           |                      |

More screenshots available in the `screenshots/` folder.

---

## ğŸš€ Features

* **Hyprland** â€” Dynamic tiling Wayland compositor with animations
* **Waybar** â€” Top bar with Unicode workspaces, module integrations
* **SwayNC** â€” Notification center with toggles and Do Not Disturb
* **Rofi (Wayland)** â€” Custom themed menus for Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, emoji picker
* **Kitty + Starship** â€” GPU-accelerated terminal with themed prompt
* **Waypaper + swww** â€” Toggleable, animated wallpaper control
* **Fish shell** â€” Smart, fast, and cyber-colored shell with aliases
* **NvChad (Neovim)** â€” Full IDE experience with LSP, formatting, custom theme
* **Ranger** â€” Terminal file manager with image/pdf previews
* **Fastfetch** â€” Fast system info splash
* **Clipse** â€” Minimal clipboard manager (replaces old Rofi clipboard script)

---

## ğŸ§± Dependencies

Install these via your AUR helper (`yay`, `paru`, etc):

```bash
yay -S zoxide bat fastfetch cava cmatrix blueman swww \
  wl-clipboard python-pywal playerctl jq fzf rofi-wayland kitty \
  neovim clipse ranger starship
```

Additional optional tools:

* `grim` + `slurp` â†’ For screenshots
* `pamixer` â†’ Volume management
* `blueman` â†’ Bluetooth system tray GUI

---

## ğŸ“¦ Included Configs

```
.config/
â”œâ”€â”€ cava/             â†’ Audio Visualizer
â”œâ”€â”€ clipse/             â†’ Clipboard manager
â”œâ”€â”€ hypr/           â†’ Hyprland config & scripts
â”œâ”€â”€ kitty/           â†’ Terminal configurations
â”œâ”€â”€ waybar/           â†’ Top bar with modules & style
â”œâ”€â”€ swaync/           â†’ Notification center
â”œâ”€â”€ rofi/             â†’ Custom menus (Wi-Fi, BT, emoji)
â”œâ”€â”€ fish/             â†’ Shell config & abbreviations
â”œâ”€â”€ fastfetch/        â†’ Info splash theme
â”œâ”€â”€ ranger/           â†’ File manager previews
â”œâ”€â”€ nvim/             â†’ Full NvChad setup
.local/share/rofi/    â†’ Rofi Theme (cyberpunk.rasi)
```

---

## âš™ï¸ Installation

> âš ï¸ Manual process. Make backups of existing configs first.

```bash
git clone https://github.com/V1xEr3bus/Cyber-Arch.git
cd Cyber-Arch

# Copy configs to your home directory
cp -r .config/* ~/.config/
cp -r .local/share/rofi ~/.local/share/rofi

# (Optional) Copy wallpapers or scripts as needed
```

After that, log in to Hyprland and enjoy your riced system.

Keep in mind that I use a Nord font, so if you are having visual problems, that's probably the first thing you need to check

---

## ğŸ”§ Custom Scripts

* `wallpaper.sh` â€” Toggle between 2 wallpaper directories (with SwayNC notification)
* `wifi.sh` â€” Rofi-based wireless menu
* `bluetooth.sh` â€” Rofi Bluetooth controller

All scripts are styled consistently to match the cyberpunk theme.

---

## ğŸ§  Philosophy

Cyber-Arch is built with a hacker/creator mindset:

* Sleek, minimal, readable
* Focused on function **and** vibe
* Everything at your fingertips, keyboard-driven

---

## ğŸ‘¤ Author & Credits

* **Created by:** [V1xEr3bus](https://github.com/V1xEr3bus)
* Inspired by r/unixporn
* Special thanks to open source tools & theme creators

---
